name: Sunset Hoppers
description:
It's that time of year again. Get ready to hop your way to the top, in Sunset Hoppers! You've got to get to the top of the tree in-time for sunset. It promises to be quite a view!

  • Hop up falling leaves! 🍂
  • Land on fluffy clouds! ☁
  • Watch out for the raindrops! 💧
  • Make it to the top! 🚩

This game was made in 21 days for the "🍁 Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021 🍄"

Theme: Autumn - This game is set in autumn and features rain, falling leaves and an overall autumn theme.

Optional mechanic: Day & Night - This game has a goal of reaching the top of the tree before sunset. The day-night cycle is shown by the sun and sky in the background.
